## Checklist

- [ ] Added or updated tests when appropriate
- [ ] Ran `pnpm lint`
- [ ] Ran `pnpm test`
- [ ] Ran `pnpm build`
- [ ] Added a changeset for any code or behavior change (`pnpm changeset`)
- [ ] Updated documentation or examples (if applicable)
- [ ] PR description includes how to verify the change
